attributes.additional_details: I am sick of this greedy coalition trying to privatize the NHS that the great Clement Attlee gave us. If anyone else feels it is sick that one day the rich that suffer will be able to live but the poor that can't help being poor will be left to die because private pockets can't make profit off of their suffering! Sign this petition to show the MPs that we do care if the poorer can get healthcare.

rejection.details: Please see: Suspend the privatisation of the NHS
